snippet.title: Delysium: Highlights of Pre-Alpha Test
snippet.description:
Delysium has just ended the Pre-Alpha test of the first game in its ecosystem recently. We would like to share some exciting moments during the four-month test. 

It's been a genuine pleasure getting to connect with all of our players and community members. 

Welcome to join our Pre-Season on October 1st, meet you there!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Building AI-Powered Virtual Society with $AGI

Buy DMA and earn $AGI early: http://delysium.com/dma 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Delysium is consistently building Virtual Society powered by AI where mankind are living together with AI Virtual Beings.

Those virtual natives could be not only the digital version of ourselves but also our companions and non-playable characters(NPCs) shuttling across diverse scenarios including games, communities, media platforms and more. 

In Delysium, everyone could create their own AI Virtual Being and gradually develop their personalities as well as abilities. Besides playing games with them, we can let our AI Virtual Beings help us view crypto assets, complete transactions, search & invest in projects more efficiently and easily, and automatically prevent various transaction risks through simple natural-language conversations.

Moreover, powered by the decentralized game publishing structure, increasing number of games with massive amount of customized tokenomics and on-chain assets (such as NFTs or tokens) will be connected, which will gradually make the Virtual Society more prosperous.

Now, the AI Virtual Beings are available to use on Delysium official website and its first game with AAA-quality has been listed on Epic Game Store.
